longBusinessSummary: Teléfonos de México, S.A.B. de C.V. operates as a telecommunications and information technology provider in Mexico. The company offers internet, entertainment, mobile, communication, safety, and home solution services; connectivity, administration, commerce and digital marketing, and other services; and IT solutions, such as cloud, data center, cyber security, collaboration, WiFi, and business solutions, as well as managed networks. It also provides links and Internet, data solutions, long distance, local telephone, and interconnection services with other telecommunications operators. The company was incorporated in 1947 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
